data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Karaman, Turkey to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Karaman, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Karaman, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2673 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 237,900 people living in the state of Karaman.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Karaman, Turkey to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Turkish people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Karaman.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 89 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Karaman, Turkey has a population of 237,900.

We estimate Karaman has 89 people who might know Jesus, 1,332 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 236,479 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,673 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Karaman. Through your servants plant 47 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Karaman
location.people_groups_list: Herki, Abkhaz, Alawite, Bosniak, Kurd, Kurmanji
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Herki (43,000), Abkhaz (164,000), Alawite (554,000), Bosniak (112,000), Kurd, Kurmanji (2,200)
